com.myronmarston.music.notation
Class Part

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.notation.AbstractNotationElement
      com.myronmarston.music.notation.Part
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotationElement
public class Part
extends AbstractNotationElement

Represents one instrumental part of the notation.

Part

public Part(Piece piece,
            Instrument instrument)
Constructor. The newly constructed part will automatically be added to the given piece.

Parameters:
piece - the notation piece that owns this part
instrument - the instrument for this part

getPieceComposer

public java.lang.String getPieceComposer()
Gets the composer of the piece. It is available here because in Guido notation the composer is notated in the first part.

Returns:
the piece composer

setNotationNoteDynamics

protected void setNotationNoteDynamics()
Sets the dynamic on each NotationNote. Should be called before getting the lilypond or guido string.

getNextIndexOfFirstNoteOfAGermCopy

protected static int getNextIndexOfFirstNoteOfAGermCopy(java.util.List<NotationNote> notes,
                                                        int currentIndex)
Gets the next index of a notation note which is the first not of a germ copy.

Parameters:
notes - the list of notation notes
currentIndex - the index to begin the search
Returns:
the next index of a first note of a germ copy, or -1 if none is found

setDynamicsOnGermCopy

protected static Dynamic setDynamicsOnGermCopy(java.util.List<NotationNote> germCopy,
                                               Dynamic lastGermCopyDynamic)
Sets the notation dynamics on the notation notes in the germ copy.

Parameters:
germCopy - a copy of the germ
lastGermCopyDynamic - the dynamic used for the last germ copy
Returns:
the dynamic used for this germ copy, which should be passed to this method as a parameter in the next iteration
